title: "Galaxy S24 has a handy interpreter app with real-time translation — here's how to use it"
excerpt: "One of the reasons why the Interpreter app on the Galaxy S24 is so useful is its ability to both audibly translate and display a transcript of the conversation all on the phone. This lets two people talk a bit more casually, letting the S24 listen and translate what they’re saying, and then giving the other person the ability to respond."
